changes: Updated the dark theme colors in the year view.
Updated dependency on @elvia/elvis-colors.
Updating prop minDate, maxDate or value will now trigger validation.
Add internal prop for showing time in min/max error when used in datepicker range.
Remove shadow when used with dark theme.
Fixed a bug where the selected date in the pop up overlay would wrap to a new line after resetting the Date Picker.
Added support for dark theme.
resetTime prop not working as intended.
Fixed a bug where the Date Picker would crash when entering a invalid date in the input field.
Fixed a bug where the Date Picker would display a 'invalid date' error when resetting the date.
Error placement was corrected after 6.1.0 bug.
Added the hasErrorPlaceholder option to the errorOptions object. This prop can be set to false to remove the padding under the form field.
Now scrolling to current year if no date is selected
Removed gradient in year picker to match other components
Add internal focus event.
Always view selectable date when datepicker opens.
Fixed the date range highlighting for @elvia/elvis-datepicker-range.
Reduced bundle size by improving the way icons are imported and used.
Return to current month when resetting date.
Use shared overlay component.
Use shared backdrop component.
Fixed a bug where the calendar would not close if the user clicked outside of it.
Fixed an issue where two dates could be marked as active if the day and month were the same digit.
The component config has been moved into each component.
Empty value was marked as invalid in Firefox and Safari, even when not required
Use @elvia/toolbox@^6.0.0. This fixes an issue where the input jumps while compact.
Update @elvia/elvis-toolbox to improve Icon Button styles.
Added support for React 18.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.1. This fixes an issue where the component would not properly unmount when used as webcomponent.
Use @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper@^3.0.0.
Use interfaces from @elvia/elvis-toolbox
Update @elvia/elvis-toolbox to improve positioning of datepicker.

Rewrote component to remove dependency to @material-ui. This means that the DOM and CSS is completely new, so if any deep CSS selectors have been used, these must be removed. Ask the design team if this means that you need a new feature to the datepicker.
The date picker will no longer reset the time on the emitted date. This behavior can be enabled by setting the new prop resetTime='true'
The prop hasErrorPlaceholderElement has been removed, since the new DOM always reserves space for error messages below the datepicker.

The prop hasValidation, showValidation, showValidationState, isErrorState and customError has been replaced by an optional object errorOptions: Partial<{text: string; hideText: boolean; isErrorState: boolean;}>. This aligns the validation logic with the one found in the timepicker component.
Use @elvia/elvis-toolbox@5.0.0
Moved the label for the compact Datepicker up to match the designs in Figma.
Padding was added over the compact Datepicker to prevent the label from overflowing.
fixes: The change impacts the total height of the compact Datepicker and other compact input elements from the Elvia design system. Ensure to adjust the spacing and/or alignment in your design to account for the larger size of all compact input elements.

changes: Fixed so that the 'year view'-icon is properly animated when the year view is opened/closed.
Removed unused dependency on prop-types.
Bumped dependency on @elvia/elvis-colors
Update dependency @elvia/elvis-toolbox to 4.0.0
Fix version dependency on @elvia/elvis-icon.
Fixed a bug that caused the year picker indicator icon to be flipped.
Fixed the version dependency of the @elvia/elvis-icon package.
Upgrade to toolbox v2.0.0
Republish due to error in the previous version.

The prop 'isFullWidth' now enables the components to fill the entire width available instead of the earlier 448px max width. If this new behavior is undesired, remove the isFullWidth prop from the component.
Reworked the way the component is declared as a module, and how types are exported for React.
Added missing peer dependencies to package.json.
Fixed a bug that caused selected date hightlighting to not work when navigating the datepicker with the keyboard.
Fix for @elvia/elvispicker-range. Fixed a bug that caused selected date range hightlighting to not work when changing the date with the keyboard.
The valueOnChange and valueOnChangeISOString events now trigger once the datepicker no longer has focus.

By default, the datepicker now has an error placeholder below it that takes up space. The height of the datepicker has therefore changed. If the internal validation of the datepicker is turned of by the showValidationState property, the error placeholder will not be shown.
fixes: If you wish to remove the error placeholder, you can do so by setting the hasErrorPlaceholderElement property to false.

changes: Addded support for date picker range.
Added event onReset that triggers whenever the reset button inside the datepicker is clicked.

Added new prop hasErrorPlaceholderElement that adds a placeholder element where the error message would be displayed whenever there is no error. This is to avoid the height of the datepicker from changing when an error is shown. Defaults to true.
Updated the logic for when to show error state in the datepicker.
Bumped the dependency on @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper to 2.3.3.
Fixed a bug that caused the valueOnChange event to fire when the value property was set on the component.
Fixed a bug that caused the datepicker to add style tags to the document head every time it was updated, sometimes causing the page to crash.
Fixed a bug that caused the datepicker to not reset when the reset button was triggered by the enter key.
Fixed a bug that caused the datepicker to not select todays date if the isOpen prop was used to open the date picker, even though hasSelectDateOnOpen was set to true.
Fixed a bug where the valueOnChangeISOString prop did not return 'Invalid Date' or 'Null' when the value was not a valid ISO string.
Fixed a bug that caused the date picker to crash when trying to manually write a date in the input field.
Added a new event prop valueOnChangeISOString that gives the chosen date as a string in ISO format without including time.
valueOnChange now gives the chosen date with time set to 00:00:00, instead of the time that the date was selected.
Fixed a bug that made it impossible to write full dates into the datepicker.
Code documentation improvements and some refactoring.
Added support for native events in React.
Fixed an issue where sending null as minDate or maxDate to the datepicker caused unexpected behaviour.
Added more aria tags for better accessibility.
Fixed an issue causing the datepicker to sometimes lose its style when used as a web component inside an  elvis-box.
Fixed an issue causing problems for events in non-React environments for props with falsy values. This  update bumps the dependency on @elvia/elvis-component-wrapper.
Added disableDate prop that allows disabling specific dates by sending in a function that returns true for dates that should be disabled.
Now listening to changes on minDate and maxDate-props and updating validation when either changes.
Now building .scss files to .css for React users.
Now using correct type for webcomponent wrapper for better internal IntelliSense.

New prop: showValidationState. If set to false, no internal validation will be shown on the datepicker. The  prop customError has higher priority and will still set the datepicker as error state if it is provided.
Several new props: isErrorState, hasValidation, clearButtonText, errorOnChange.
A button to clear the selected date has been added inside the datepicker, and its text can be changed  through the clearButtonText prop.
The function errorOnChange is called every time the internal error of the datepicker is updated. This can be  used for external error validation in conjunction with isErrorState and hasValidation.
The datepicker input field is now given a green active state when the datepicker is open.
The input placeholder is no longer possible to select.
Setting both 'isCompact' and 'isFullWidth' now gives compact and full width (i.e. width: 100%).
Now using elvis-icon package for internal icons.
Added showValidation prop to trigger showing errors if datepicker has not been in focus
Added hasOptionalText prop
Added inlineStyle and className props
Updated dependencies
Remove fixed width
New props: placeholder and isOpen
Fullwidth prop fix
New prop: hasSelectDateOnOpen
Added unit tests for datepicker
Web component wrapper fix
Now sending events when no date, or invalid date, is selected
Reformated config file
Changed max width to match other input elements
Added callback functions for both onOpen and onClose of datepicker
Datepicker now has highest possible z-index so that it always lays on top of other components.
Added type declaration (for react)
Updated red validation color to new elvia red (#EE0701)
First version of datepicker.
